title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements for the BionicConstructionExoskeleton system.

title: Design and Architecture
description: Develop the overall system architecture, including hardware and software components, and define the integration points.

title: Hardware Development
description: Design and develop the physical exoskeleton hardware components, including materials, sensors, and actuators.

title: Software Development
description: Develop the software components for controlling and monitoring the exoskeleton system.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate the hardware and software components, and conduct thorough testing to ensure the system's functionality and safety.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the system meets all relevant security and compliance requirements for construction sites and worker safety.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and training materials for the system's operation and maintenance.

title: Deployment and Support
description: Plan and execute the deployment of the BionicConstructionExoskeleton system on construction sites, and establish support and maintenance processes.
